node.title: Penrith Panthers terminate Tyrone May's NRL contract
node.alt: Tyrone May of the Penrith Panthers passes a ball.
node.description: The NRL premiers cut ties with Tyrone May, following his conduct on social media after the club's grand-final victory.
node.content: ["Penrith Panthers have terminated Tyrone May's contract with immediate effect, following his\u00a0conduct on social media after\u00a0the club's grand-final win over South Sydney.", "The Panthers\u00a0board of directors said\u00a0May's conduct after last month's grand final \"constituted a serious breach of his contractual obligations\".", "They had also given\u00a0consideration to previous breaches in making the decision to terminate May's contract.", "\"As a club, we understand our responsibilities to the game, our corporate partners, our members and fans, and the wider rugby league community,\" Panthers chief executive Brian Fletcher said in a club statement.", "\"The board observed due process in this matter and considered all relevant factors before reaching its final decision.", "\"Panthers will coordinate with the NRL to ensure Tyrone receives access to any support services he needs moving forward.\"", "More to come.", "ABC/AAP"]
